type.description:
## Invisible

---



[Entity Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/invisible)

Checks whether the entity is currently invisible.

Type ID: `origins:invisible`




---

### Examples

```json
"condition": {
    "type": "origins:invisible"
}
```
